title: Muc-Off V2 Tubeless Valves are lighter, stronger and tire insert compatible
content:
Muc-Off have released tire insert compatible tubeless valves. These are their second generation tubeless valves, now made from a lighter, stronger aluminium. The rim-side is shaped specifically to allow air and sealant to flow freely into the tire even when you’ve a tight tire insert installed. Here’s more. Muc-Off V2 Tubeless Valves First, why? Regular […]

The post Muc-Off V2 Tubeless Valves are lighter, stronger and tire insert compatible appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
